author: Mike Kerrigan
title: Diamonds Aren’t Tommy’s Best Friend. I Am
text:
It’s Valentine’s Day, but what to bring as tribute to that special someone? While sonnets worked for Shakespeare, surely for us lesser mortals a thoughtful gift remains the smart play. But there’s the rub, as the Bard himself put it. Finding the right present has never been harder, at least for a literal man like me.

One television commercial is particularly confusing. It calls for purchasing two gemstones: “One diamond for your best friend. One diamond for your true love.” I get why I would buy a diamond for my beloved wife,...
